global-can.description:
Our abstract collection is the easiest way to turn any room into your favorite space. Canvases from this collection will have your guests impressed from the minute they walk in the room.

Art made by Fernando Vieira

MATERIAL & QUALITY

 

  • Hand stretched with love in our Florida, USA facility
  • All canvases are ready-to-hang with 1.5 inch sawtooth hangers. Just unwrap and hang right out of the box 
  • 80% polyester, 20% cotton with matte finished wrap
  • Fade, tear, water, scratch, and warp resistant
  • Eco-certified premium water-based ink
Framing Options
  • Floating Frames have a floating effect to give your artwork a clean, sophisticated feel
  • Gallery Wraps are made with mirrored edges and stretched by hand by our experts. They are gallery wrapped over high-quality SPF wooden frames.
Delivery & Shipping Details
  • All canvases are made-to-order in our Florida, USA facility
  • Processing Time: Typically 2-3 days
  • Shipping Time: Typically 2-5 days
  • Total Time: Typically 4-8 days
  • Simply put, a maximum time of 8 days for any order during typical times. During holidays, there may be delayed shipments

Our abstract collection is the easiest way to turn any room into your favorite space. Canvases from this collection will have your guests impressed from the minute they walk in the room.

*This is a single black canvas, set of three is available if you purchase all 3 'Fresh Paint' canvases. 

Art made by Fernando Vieira


MATERIAL & QUALITY

 

  • Hand stretched with love in our Florida, USA facility
  • All canvases are ready-to-hang with 1.5 inch sawtooth hangers. Just unwrap and hang right out of the box 
  • 80% polyester, 20% cotton with matte finished wrap
  • Fade, tear, water, scratch, and warp resistant
  • Eco-certified premium water-based ink
Framing Options
  • Floating Frames have a floating effect to give your artwork a clean, sophisticated feel
  • Gallery Wraps are made with mirrored edges and stretched by hand by our experts. They are gallery wrapped over high-quality SPF wooden frames.
Delivery & Shipping Details
  • All canvases are made-to-order in our Florida, USA facility
  • Processing Time: Typically 2-3 days
  • Shipping Time: Typically 2-5 days
  • Total Time: Typically 4-8 days
  • Simply put, a maximum time of 8 days for any order during typical times. During holidays, there may be delayed shipments
